#labels Featured
#summary ErlMail Mail Server

= Introduction =

ErlMail is an ongoing project to create a complete RFC compiant Email server written in [http://www.erlang.org Erlang] using OTP best practices.

The main features (both functional and planned) of the ErlMail email server are:

 * OTP compliant SMTP server and client
 * OTP compliant IMAP server and client
 * OTP compliant POP server and client
 * Modular [MessageStore message store] that allows uses to create their own connection to any messaging backend
